TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedElement extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement

summary.span: 标识 下的元素层次结构中的元素。

span.span: Identifies an element within the hierarchy of elements under a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档的每一页 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 都包含一个 元素，该元素以位置文本运行和图形的形式定义其 *内容* 。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 通过使用文档结构元素， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 还可以将文档的页面与用 节、段落、列表、图表和表的形式定义页面 *结构* 的元素相关联。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 类用于定义文档标记的内容和结构部分之间的关联。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. 是结构化元素的子元素，如位于页面层次结构中的表格单元或项目符号列表项 。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. 标识 同一页的层次结构中的项。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它引用的项是结构元素的内容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 有关文档的结构元素的详细信息 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] ，请参阅 \*XML 纸张规范 \* 的第9章和附录 E (XPS) 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000) 。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在文档中使用和元素 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] ，每个元素都有一个 子元素。The following example shows the use of and elements in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, each with a child. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 父级提供内容的 标记层次结构中的元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element in the markup hierarchy that provides the content for the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应该与 所引用的元素的属性相同 。 should be identical to the attribute of the element to which the refers. ## Examples 下面的示例演示多个 元素，每个元素都有一个 属性。The following example shows several elements, each with a attribute. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]
